Package org.neo4j.kernel.impl.locking

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Locks
    API for managing locks.
    Locks.Client  
    Locks.Visitor
    For introspection and debugging.
    LocksFactory  
    StatementLocks
    Component used by KernelStatement to acquire pessimistic and optimistic locks.
    StatementLocksFactory
    Factory to create StatementLocks instances.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActiveLock  
    DumpLocksVisitor  
    FrozenStatementLocks
    StatementLocks implementation that stops all optimistic and pessimistic interactions with the LockClients.
    LockClientStateHolder
    State control class for Locks.Clients.
    LockCountVisitor  
    NoOpClient  
    ResourceIds  
    SimpleStatementLocks
    A StatementLocks implementation that uses given Locks.Client for both optimistic and pessimistic locks.
    SimpleStatementLocksFactory
    A StatementLocksFactory that creates SimpleStatementLocks.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    LockAcquisitionTimeoutException
    Used in lock clients for cases when we unable to acquire a lock for a time that exceed configured timeout, if any.
    LockClientStoppedException
    Exception thrown when stopped Locks.Client used to acquire locks.
